name: Happl
long_description:
Happl - Personalised benefits for employees to choose what’s right for them, and tools for managers to engage their teams, whilst we take care of all the compliance and admin.

Founded in 2020 and based in London, UK, Happl works with some of the UK’s leading employers to bring their hybrid working culture to life!

https://www.happl.com/
one_liner: Your personalised benefits and engagement platform for global teams
